thread.title: This Twitter Conversation Between Saroj Khan & Varun Dhawan Proves They’ve Buried The Hatchet
thread.title_full: This Twitter Conversation Between Saroj Khan & Varun Dhawan Proves They’ve Buried The Hatchet

author: Divya Rao
title: This Twitter Conversation Between Saroj Khan & Varun Dhawan Proves They’ve Buried The Hatchet

organizations.name: twitter conversation between saroj khan & varun dhawan

text:
Divya Rao Feb . 21 . 2017 Varun Dhawan, Saroj Khan 
Varun Dhawan ‘s upcoming film Badrinath Ki Dulhania opposite Alia Bhatt released their special song Tamma Tamma a couple of days ago. While they were praised aplenty for the fabulous recreation of the song, Saroj Khan seemed a little upset because they didn’t ask her for permission before the same. She came out and made her displeasure known. Upon hearing this, Varun apologised to her. 
This made Saroj Khan very happy and she took to Twitter to share her feelings. Varun is a wonderful boy, same like his father David Ji. I wish him all the best. @PinkvillaHindi @aliaa08 @ShashankKhaitan @Varun_dvn 
— Saroj Khan (@sarojkhanji) February 17, 2017 
And Varun replied saying this. Thank you ma'am. Lots of love and thank you for the blessing @sarojkhanji #legend https://t.co/Y551OwbLLM 
— Varun Badri Dhawan (@Varun_dvn) February 18, 2017 
Aww! Looks like all’s well that end’s well. :) 0
